statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET progress = 50 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE user_profiles SET progress = progress + 1, avatar_url = 'https://newavatar.com' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE users SET progress = progress + 1 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
